rgb2gray

 rgb2gray (img)

Convert RGB image to grayscale.
Here is an example of conversionâ€¦

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from io import BytesIO
import requests


red = Image.new('RGB', (10, 10), color = (255,0,0))
rgb2gray(red)
